attributes.action: funding cuts for children with special education needs in east cheshire schools
attributes.additional_details: I want Michael Gove to reverse his decision to cut funding for pupils with special needs in schools in the East Cheshire Council.This funding is vital for children with complex needs who need an adult with them at all times.Schools have been told that this funding must now come from within the regular school funds and the money simply isn' there.This will mean that teaching assistants will lose their jobs and some children will not be able to go to school.What of their future?This decision is  unjust.
